title: Google\Cloud\GkeHub\V1beta1\ResourceManifest
name: ResourceManifest
description:
ResourceManifest represents a single Kubernetes resource to be applied to the cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gkehub.v1beta1.ResourceManifest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.cluster_scoped
params.description: Whether the resource provided in the manifest is cluster_scoped. If unset, the manifest is assumed to be namespace scoped. This field is used for REST mapping when applying the resource in a cluster.

methods.name: getManifest
methods.description:
YAML manifest of the resource.
